Welcome To SinGold!
how is the app work?
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data Play Again classical music opera classical Israel army bands songs bands classic folk dance languages yiddish hebrew english russian arabic dance waltz tango samba jaz rock pollack religion chazanout from pray propnrmts propnents relaxing runnig water insteumental country answer What music did he here in his home? What music he listened when he was young? ma7zaot disk favorite singer weeding song favorite song songs folk dances login7 Login at least 3 username is already there at least 9 number please answer the question! search at least 10 numbers enter your adress enter your year of birth language language city religion languages patient id The Song Name Singer Link That help finding approprite song personlly for every Alzheimer \'s patient. According to studies In the field of music history, The most influential music is the music we hear in the time we were teenagers until the twenties. " What is the most influential music in our lives?" When we choose music for an Alzheimer \'s patient, we choose the music he heard in his youth. what music should we choose for an Alzheimer \'s patient? This application is based on the principle of crowds by building a database that stores information about patients diagnosed with appropriate personal music called therapists from across the country. The application provides search engine and find new patients as per minimum for each patient Questionaire New Matching Play List culture culture Select keep signed in EMAIL OR PASSWORD WRONG Family Phone: Id: First Name: Last Name: Year Of Birth Singer Music he listen at home Music he listened when he was young anothr acount matching survey Patient Details Playlist Questionnaire Personal Id Forien Music Israely Music Play choise choose if you don\'t have any patients enter the icon to add patient if you don\'t have a list of patients enter the icon to add patient enter the icon at the bottom to add patient Click on the icon at the bottom to add patient Are you sure ØŸ Yes No Delete Song
